page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT-BREAKDANCING
page.content: The biggest dance craze in the l980's is break dancing. Breakdancing has been in America since l977 when street gangs were very popular. Street gangs used to wield crow bars against each other and people used to get killed. To prevent violence they invented breakdancing. The different moves in breakdancing have a gallery of names.The main object of breakdancing is to watch your opposition carefully and then try to better his move. The music used is electronic and computerised. We still go about in gangs when we are breakdancing. These gangs are called crews. They compete against other crews. Breakdancing hit Sheffield two years ago. In Sheffield it provides a chance for the youth of the city to keep out of trouble.
